forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 24. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 9. Wind chill values as low as -1. Northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun dances playfully upon the streets of Boston, casting long shadows that stretch along the cobblestones of the historic downtown. With temperatures hovering just under a pleasant 24 degrees, there's a crispness in the air—a fine north wind stirring, offering a refreshing embrace that tidily counters the warmth that the day promises. As you walk through the seemingly still city, the sky wears a coat of partly sunny tranquility, hinting at brighter moments to come. Yet, despite this cheer, the gusts of wind whisper a reminder of winter's lingering presence, urging you to be mindful of the chill if you venture outdoors.

As evening approaches, the charm of the city takes on a softer tone, enveloped in a gown of mostly cloudy skies. With the mercury dropping closer to 9 degrees, the night beckons a protective layer; a sturdy coat, a warm scarf, perhaps a knit hat are your best companions to stave off the encroaching chill. A stroll along the Esplanade might reward you with a serene view of the river, while sipping a warm drink from a local café offers a moment of respite and comfort as the wind picks up with a gentler, yet persistent force. For the hearty souls in search of activity, an evening walk through the quieter streets, where the flickering lights of shop windows illuminate your path, is a perfect way to savor this winter day, pausing now and then to appreciate the glimmers of life around you.
